example[0]: He was now the proud owner of a bright red sports car.
example[2]: Dog-owners have been warned to keep their animals under control.
example[3]: I met the owner of the local hotel.
definition[1]: a person or organization that owns something
example[4]: Legally, the buyer becomes the owner at the instant the contract is made.
example[5]: The bank’s new fixed-rate mortgage is proving popular with home owners.
example[6]: The publisher is the owner of the trademark ‘Oxford’.
definition[2]: if something is bought or taken somewhere at the owner’s risk, the owner, not the person selling it or taking it, is responsible if it is damaged or lost
example[7]: Luggage is carried at the owner’s risk.
